    • calculateResultingPlayerDamage

      public static double calculateResultingPlayerDamage(net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player, net.minecraft.entity.damage.DamageSource source, double damageAmount)
      Calculate the resulting damage dealt to a player as a result of some damage. If this player were to receive this damage, the player's health will be subtracted by the resulting value.
